body_html:
Actually, I do not use Ipython. I encounter the problem like the above when loading model trained on other GPU.
the error message is "cuda runtime error (59) : device-side assert triggered at /b/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCTensorCopy.c:65"
maybe they aren't the same problem ...

body:
Actually, I do not use Ipython. I encounter the problem like the above when loading model trained on other GPU.
the error message is "cuda runtime error (59) : device-side assert triggered at /b/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCTensorCopy.c:65"
maybe they aren't the same problem ...
